utils.modelling package

Submodules

utils.modelling.control module

utils.modelling.control.rotation2coords(x, y, x0, y0, v, Dt, R=0.5)[source]

Estimates for all cylinders the rotation coordinates along their surface after a given delta t

Parameters:

  • x,y – cartesian coordinates of specific surface coordinate of cylinder(s) (at r = R)

  • x0,y0 – cartesian coordinates of cylinder centers

  • v – linear velocity of cylinder surface (at r = R)

  • Dt – delta time

  • R – cylinder radius

Returns:

cartesian coordinates of cylinder coordinates at r = R after rotation

utils.modelling.custom_losses module

class utils.modelling.custom_losses.MeanSquaredError(reduction='auto', name='mean_squared_error')[source]

Bases: MeanSquaredError

Provides mean squared error metrics: loss / residuals. Use mean squared error for regression problems with one or more outputs.

utils.modelling.errors_flow module

utils.modelling.errors_flow.get_CEA(Dtrue, D, B)[source]

Estimates Cumulative Energetic Accuracy (similar to CE) for snapshot matrix

Parameters:

  • Dtrue – ground truth of snapshot matrix (N_v, N_t) or (N_w, N_v, N_t)

  • D – reconstructed snapshot matrix (N_v, N_t) or (N_w, N_v, N_t)

  • B – mask grid (1 if body, 0 otherwise)

Returns:

CEA

utils.modelling.errors_flow.get_RMSE(Dtrue, D, B, flag_type)[source]

Estimates Root Mean Square Error (normalized with standard deviation of ground truth flow) for snapshot matrix

Parameters:

  • Dtrue – ground truth of snapshot matrix (N_v, N_t) or (N_w, N_v, N_t)

  • D – reconstructed snapshot matrix (N_v, N_t) or (N_w, N_v, N_t)

  • B – mask grid (1 if body, 0 otherwise)

  • flag_type – ‘W’ if whole error, ‘S’ if spatial, ‘T’ if temporal

Returns:

RMSE

utils.modelling.errors_flow.get_cos_similarity(Dtrue, D, B)[source]

Estimates temporal cosine similarity Sc for snapshot matrix

Parameters:

  • Dtrue – ground truth of snapshot matrix (N_v, N_t) or (N_w, N_v, N_t)

  • D – reconstructed snapshot matrix (N_v, N_t) or (N_w, N_v, N_t)

  • B – mask grid (1 if body, 0 otherwise)

Returns:

Sc

utils.modelling.errors_z module

utils.modelling.errors_z.get_R2factor(Xtrue, X, flag_R2method, w_prop=0)[source]

Estimates R2 factor for latent space up to a certain length of the PW

Parameters:

  • Xtrue – ground truth of latent space (N_t, N_z) or (N_w, N_t, N_z)

  • X – reconstructed latent space (N_t, N_z) or (N_w, N_t, N_z)

  • w_prop – PW window to evaluate RMSE

  • flag_R2method – ‘D’ if deterministic, ‘C’ if correlation

Returns:

R2 factor for each latent coordinate

utils.modelling.errors_z.get_RMSE_z(Xtrue, X, w_prop=0)[source]

Estimation of Root Mean Square Error (normalized with standard deviation of ground truth latent coordinate) for latent space up to a certain length of the PW

Parameters:

  • Xtrue – ground truth of latent space (N_t, N_z) or (N_w, N_t, N_z)

  • X – reconstructed latent space (N_t, N_z) or (N_w, N_t, N_z)

  • w_prop – PW window to evaluate RMSE

Returns:

RMSE for each latent coordinate

utils.modelling.errors_z.get_frequencies(z)[source]

Estimation of most relevant frequencies for each latent coordinate

Parameters:

z – latent space (N_t, N_z)

Returns:

frequency array

utils.modelling.errors_z.get_latent_MI(z)[source]

Estimation of Mutual Information (nonlinear correlation) for latent space

Parameters:

z – latent space (N_t, N_z)

Returns:

Mutual information matrix

utils.modelling.errors_z.get_latent_correlation_matrix(z)[source]

Obtains correlation matrix for latent space

Parameters:

z – latent space (N_t, N_z)

Returns:

determinant of correlation matrix, mean of corr matrix and correlation matrx

utils.modelling.errors_z.get_max_w_prop(Xtrue, X, w_p)[source]

Estimation of number of time instants where prediction is above a certain R2 threshold

Parameters:

  • Xtrue – ground truth of latent space (N_w, N_t, N_z)

  • X – reconstructed latent space (N_w, N_t, N_z)

  • w_p – PW window to evaluate RMSE

Returns:

number of prediction time instants where condition holds
